verification.subject: Welcome to Syria GPT - Verify Your Email
verification.text_template:
Welcome to Syria GPT!

Hello {display_name},

Thank you for signing up with Syria GPT! To complete your registration, please verify your email address by visiting this link:

{verification_url}

This verification link will expire in 24 hours.

If you didn't create an account with Syria GPT, please ignore this email.

Welcome aboard!

--
Syria GPT Team

password_reset.subject: Reset Your Password - Syria GPT
password_reset.text_template:
Password Reset Request

Hello {display_name},

We received a request to reset your password for your Syria GPT account. If you made this request, please click the link below to reset your password:

{reset_link}

This password reset link will expire in 60 minutes.

If you didn't request a password reset, please ignore this email. Your password will remain unchanged.

For security reasons, this link can only be used once.

--
Syria GPT Team
